Chick Fila Recipe: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper  to taste

Chicken Couscous: Vegetables - Carrots, celery and red onion are all baked with the chicken
Raisins - An optional topping before serving

Chicken Fajita Mac and Cheese Recipe: 12 oz. pasta shapes, such as rotini
3 bell peppers (multiple colors), seeded and thinly sliced
1 small to medium yellow onion, thinly sliced

Chicken Ham and Leek Pie Recipe: 2 leeks, trimmed and cut into 1cm/½in slices
150g/5½oz piece thickly carved ham, cut into 2cm/¾in chunks
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper

Chicken Quinoa Greek Salad Recipe: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized chunks
3 cups cooked quinoa, cooled to room temperature (I used a mixture of white and red)
1/3 cup chopped tomatoes, I used cherry tomatoes

General Tso's Chicken Recipe: 2 lb chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 tsp sesame seeds, optional for garnish

Honey Balsamic Chicken with Crispy Brocc: 2 Tbsp AOOC 18-Year Barrel Aged Traditional Balsamic
Basiks Original Seasoning Blend (or Seasoning Salt)

Katsu Chicken curry Recipe: 4 tbsp rapeseed oil or vegetable oil
2 x 200g pouches cooked rice (we used brown basmati)
½ large cucumber, peeled into ribbons
handful mint leaves or coriander leaves, or both
